title: Chicken & Masa Dumplings Stew
description: Rustic and comforting stew with tender chicken, purple potatoes, smoky poblanos, and masa dumplings.
ingredients: 1/4 cup chopped Chives or Green Onions
1 large Poblano Pepper, roasted, peeled, seeded, and chopped
1 lb Purple Potatoes, cut into 1/2 inch cubes
Fresh Chives or Green Onions for garnish
instructions: Prepare the Chochoyotes: In a medium bowl, combine masa harina, salt, and olive oil. Mix until coarse sand. Gradually add water, mixing until soft dough forms. Stir in chives. Knead, rest 10-15m. Shape into balls with indentation.
Start the Stew Base: Heat olive oil. Add onion powder and garlic, cook 1 min. Add poblano and tomatoes, cook 5 mins. Pour in broth. Add potatoes, cumin, chili powder, oregano, salt, pepper. Simmer.
Cook Chicken and Chochoyotes: Add chicken. Simmer 10-15m until potatoes tender. Drop dumplings in gently. Cook 10-15m until floating.
Finish the Stew: Stir in Swiss chard, cook 2-3m. Adjust seasoning. Serve garnished.

title: Spicy Chicken & Poblano Soup
description: Vibrant and spicy soup highlighting smoky roasted poblanos and habanero.
ingredients: 2 large Poblano Peppers, roasted, peeled, seeded, and chopped
1 lb Purple Potatoes, cut into 1/2 inch cubes
Fresh Chives or Green Onions for garnish
instructions: Prepare Aromatics: Heat olive oil. Add onion powder and garlic, cook 1 min. Add poblanos, habanero, tomatoes. Cook 5-7 mins.
Build the Soup: Pour in broth. Add potatoes, cumin, chili powder, salt, black pepper. Simmer. Cook 15-20m until potatoes tender.
Add Chicken and Finish: Stir in chicken, heat 5 mins. Remove from heat. Stir in lemon juice. Adjust seasoning. Serve garnished.
